about_the_game:
Age of History 3: P2P Multiplayer Mode

Expand your Age of History 3 experience with the P2P Multiplayer Mode DLC! Connect with friends and rivals across the world to reshape the course of history in real-time. With this DLC, you can now take your strategic prowess beyond single-player campaigns and challenge others in thrilling PvP battles or form alliances for cooperative gameplay.

  • Direct Player Connections: Utilize peer-to-peer technology for smooth, low-latency multiplayer matches.

  • Strategic Depth in Real-Time: Test your skills against other players or work together to build powerful empires.

  • No Servers Required: Experience seamless connections without relying on central servers, allowing for a more direct multiplayer experience.

  • Endless Replayability: Compete across the timeline of human history, from ancient civilizations to futuristic empires.

Take your journey beyond borders and rewrite history—together. Whether you conquer or collaborate, the world is yours to shape.

Age of History 3: P2P Multiplayer Mode

Expand your Age of History 3 experience with the P2P Multiplayer Mode DLC! Connect with friends and rivals across the world to reshape the course of history in real-time. With this DLC, you can now take your strategic prowess beyond single-player campaigns and challenge others in thrilling PvP battles or form alliances for cooperative gameplay.

  • Direct Player Connections: Utilize peer-to-peer technology for smooth, low-latency multiplayer matches.

  • Strategic Depth in Real-Time: Test your skills against other players or work together to build powerful empires.

  • No Servers Required: Experience seamless connections without relying on central servers, allowing for a more direct multiplayer experience.

  • Endless Replayability: Compete across the timeline of human history, from ancient civilizations to futuristic empires.

Take your journey beyond borders and rewrite history—together. Whether you conquer or collaborate, the world is yours to shape.
name: Age of History 3: Multiplayer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.7 GHz Single Core
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/10/11 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo 3.0Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 460
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Expand your Age of History 3 experience with the highly anticipated P2P Multiplayer Mode DLC! Connect with friends and rivals across the world to reshape the course of history in real-time.
